name: docs
description: The documentation site for the TimeTiles project.

scripts.docs:api: cd ../web && pnpm exec typedoc && tsx ../docs/scripts/clean-typedoc-output.ts && tsx ../docs/scripts/generate-api-meta.ts
scripts.lint: eslint app content scripts --cache --format json --output-file .lint-results.json; eslint app content scripts --cache && SKIP_EXTERNAL=1 tsx scripts/check-links.ts
scripts.lint:all: eslint app content scripts --cache && tsx scripts/check-links.ts
scripts.format: eslint app content scripts --cache --fix --quiet && prettier --write . --ignore-path ../../.prettierignore --log-level error
